alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 3:46PM PST until February 15 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph in the higher elevations and north winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph in the Owens Valley. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
